articles.title: Tesla launches Wireless Charging Platform that can power up to three devices - Lifestyle Asia India
articles.description: Tesla's Wireless Charging Platform is capable of rapidly charging up to three devices, including tow smartphones.
articles.content:
Tesla has launched a Wireless Charging Platform whose design draws inspiration from the company’s Cybertruck. The wireless charging pad is capable of rapidly charging up to three devices.
